The ancient crystal is a drop obtained from revenants found in the Revenant Caves.

Four of these, along with four marble blocks and level 80 Construction, are required in order to build an obelisk in the Superior Garden of a player-owned house.

Products[edit | edit source]

ItemMembersSkillsXPMaterials
Obelisk (Construction)
  • 80
  • 3000
  • 4 × Ancient crystal
  • 4 × Marble block

[[File:Ancient crystal detail.png|170px|left]]
The '''ancient crystal''' is a drop obtained from [[revenants]] found in the [[Revenant Caves]].

Four of these, along with four [[marble block]]s and level 80 [[Construction]], are required in order to build an [[Obelisk (Construction)|obelisk]] in the [[Superior Garden]] of a [[player-owned house]].
